full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'KHOR LO 'BAR BA'I BSGRUB THABS 'DON CHA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B ('KHOR LO 'BAR BA'I SGRUB THABS KYI 'DON CHA LUGS GCIG SBRAG NAS SGRIGS PA 'DI NI, DON GYI SLAD DU MTSAN NAS SMOS TE MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DANG DBYER MA MCHIS PA BKRA SHIS CAN MNYAM @009A *, ,MED RJE BTZUN 'GRO MGON BSTAN PA'I NYI MA DPAL BZANG POS 'DI LTA BU SGRIGS SHIG BKA' STZAL PA DANG DU BLANGS STE, DAM PA DE NYID KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BI KshU WAKINDRAS BSGRIGS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,'DIS KYANG DAM PA DE NYID KYI ZHABS PAD RDO RJE LTAR BRTAN CING ZHAM 'BRING BA RNAMS KYIS CHOS SPYOD BCU'I MTHUN SKYED THAMS CAD YID BZHIN DU 'GRUB PAR 'GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,)
